    BillController
    The BillController class provides methods for creating, viewing, updating, and paying bills for a hospital management system.
    FeedbackController
     
    ForgetPasswordController
    The ForgetPasswordController class manages the forget password functionality.
    InventoryController
    Controller class for managing the inventory of medicines in a hospital management system.
    MedicalRecordsController
    The MedicalRecordsController class is responsible for managing and processing medical records in a hospital management system.
    MenuController
    The MenuController class determines and displays the appropriate menu based on the user's role.
    PrescriptionController
    The PrescriptionController class handles operations related to prescriptions, including updating prescription statuses, managing medicine stock levels, and retrieving prescription details.
